long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is supposed to make searching through your bookmarks both easy and natural. Lots of other bookmark search extensions out there want to implement some strange user interface or make you go somewhere else in the chrome settings to search your bookmarks. The idea behind this app is to put bookmark search right where you need it, in the url bar.

When the extension is loaded in chrome you can activate bookmark search by entering s then tab in the url bar.

When you start typing the extension will search bookmark folder names and bookmark title to find what you are looking for.

The results will be displayed as auto complete results under the url bar in the following format ðŸ‘‰ [bookmark folder path] [bookmark title]
